Master concurrency, web development, microservices, and cloud-native applications with expert AI agents.
--- ## üìë Table of Contents
Click to expand - [Quick Start](#-quick-start) - [Features](#-features) - [Agents](#-agents) - [Skills](#-skills) - [Commands](#-commands) - [Documentation](#-documentation) - [Contributing](#-contributing) - [License](#-license)
--- ## üöÄ Quick Start ### Prerequisites - Claude Code CLI v2.0.27+ - Active Claude subscription ### Installation (Choose One)
Option 1: From Marketplace (Recommended) ```bash # Step 1Ô∏è‚É£ Add the marketplace /plugin marketplace add pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-go # Step 2Ô∏è‚É£ Install the plugin /plugin install go-development-assistant@pluginagentmarketplace-go # Step 3Ô∏è‚É£ Restart Claude Code # Close and reopen your terminal/IDE ```
Option 2: Local Installation ```bash # Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-go.git cd custom-plugin-go # Load locally /plugin load . # Restart Claude Code ```
### ‚úÖ Verify Installation After restart, you should see these agents: ``` go-development-assistant:01-go-fundamentals go-development-assistant:02-go-concurrency go-development-assistant:03-go-web go-development-assistant:04-go-database go-development-assistant:05-go-testing go-development-assistant:06-go-cli go-development-assistant:07-go-microservices go-development-assistant:08-go-devops ``` --- ## ‚ú® Features | Feature | Description | |---------|-------------| | ü§ñ **8 Agents** | Specialized AI agents for Go tasks | | üõ†Ô∏è **12 Skills** | Reusable capabilities with Golden Format | | ‚å®Ô∏è **4 Commands** | Quick slash commands | | üîÑ **SASMP v1.3.0** | Full protocol compliance | | üêπ **Cloud Native** | Goroutines, channels, Kubernetes ready | --- ## ü§ñ Agents ### 8 Specialized Agents | # | Agent | Purpose | |---|-------|---------| | 1 | **01-go-fundamentals** | Go basics, syntax, variables, control flow | | 2 | **02-go-concurrency** | Goroutines, channels, sync primitives | | 3 | **03-go-web** | HTTP servers, Gin, REST APIs | | 4 | **04-go-database** | SQL, GORM, data persistence | | 5 | **05-go-testing** | Unit tests, benchmarks, coverage | | 6 | **06-go-cli** | CLI application development | | 7 | **07-go-microservices** | gRPC, service architecture | | 8 | **08-go-devops** | Docker, Kubernetes, deployment | --- ## üõ†Ô∏è Skills ### Available Skills | Skill | Description | Invoke | |-------|-------------|--------| | `go-fundamentals` | Go language basics | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-fundamentals")` | | `go-concurrency` | Goroutines and channels | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-concurrency")` | | `go-web-apis` | HTTP and REST development | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-web-apis")` | | `go-database` | SQL and ORM patterns | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-database")` | | `go-testing` | Testing strategies | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-testing")` | | `go-cli-tools` | CLI development | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-cli-tools")` | | `go-grpc` | gRPC and Protocol Buffers | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-grpc")` | | `go-docker` | Containerization | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-docker")` | | `go-cli` | Command-line interfaces | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-cli")` | | `go-performance` | Optimization techniques | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-performance")` | | `go-kubernetes` | K8s deployment | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-kubernetes")` | | `go-modules` | Module management | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-modules")` | --- ## ‚å®Ô∏è Commands | Command | Description | |---------|-------------| | `/go-check` | Run comprehensive quality checks | | `/go-new` | Create new Go project | | `/go-build` | Build for multiple platforms | | `/go-debug` | Debug with Delve | --- ## üìö Documentation | Document | Description | |----------|-------------| | [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md) | Version history | | [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) | How to contribute | | [LICENSE](LICENSE) | License information | --- ## üìÅ Project Structure
Click to expand ``` custom-plugin-go/ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÅ .claude-plugin/ ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ plugin.json ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ marketplace.json ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÅ agents/ # 8 agents ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÅ skills/ # 12 skills (Golden Format) ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÅ commands/ # 4 commands ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÅ hooks/ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÑ README.md ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÑ CHANGELOG.md ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÑ LICENSE ```

{
  "name": "custom-plugin-flutter",
  "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "description": "Industrial-grade Flutter development plugin with 8 specialized agents and 12 production-ready skills covering UI, state management, backend integration, database design, performance optimization, testing, DevOps, and native platform integration. 15,500+ lines of expert content, 200+ code examples, 25+ projects.",
  "author": "Custom Plugin Development Team",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "repository": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-flutter.git",
  "eqhm_enabled": true,
  "keywords": [
    "flutter",
    "dart",
    "custom-plugin-flutter",
    "mobile-development",
    "ui-development",
    "state-management",
    "backend-integration",
    "database-design",
    "performance-optimization",
    "testing-qa",
    "devops-deployment",
    "platform-integration",
    "accessibility",
    "animations",
    "navigation",
    "localization",
    "plugins",
    "production-ready",
    "enterprise-architecture"
  ],
  "agents": [
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-ui",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: UI Development",
      "description": "Deep expertise in Flutter widget systems, constraint-based layouts, Material Design 3, Cupertino design, custom widget composition, animation frameworks, and responsive design patterns for cross-platform excellence.",
      "path": "./agents/01-flutter-ui-development.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-state-management",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: State Management",
      "description": "Master all state management patterns: setState, Provider, Riverpod, BLoC, GetX. Deep expertise in dependency injection, state persistence, serialization, and scalable architecture patterns for enterprise applications.",
      "path": "./agents/02-state-management.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-backend",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Backend Integration",
      "description": "Complete backend integration mastery: HTTP clients (http, Dio, Chopper), REST APIs, GraphQL, WebSockets, JWT authentication, Firebase integration, error handling, real-time data synchronization, and API architecture patterns.",
      "path": "./agents/03-backend-integration.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-database",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Database & Storage",
      "description": "Expert-level database architecture: SharedPreferences, Hive, SQLite, ObjectBox, Firestore, Realtime Database. Schema design, migrations, encryption, offline-first patterns, conflict resolution, and intelligent sync strategies.",
      "path": "./agents/04-database-storage.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-performance",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Performance Optimization",
      "description": "Deep performance engineering: build optimization, 60+ FPS rendering, memory profiling, asset optimization, code splitting, image handling, network efficiency, battery optimization, APK/IPA size reduction, and production monitoring.",
      "path": "./agents/05-performance-optimization.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-testing",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Testing & QA",
      "description": "Comprehensive testing mastery: unit tests, widget tests, integration tests, E2E testing, test coverage metrics, mocking strategies, CI/CD integration, performance testing, accessibility testing, and quality gates.",
      "path": "./agents/06-testing-qa.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-devops",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: DevOps & Deployment",
      "description": "Production deployment expertise: iOS/Android build systems, code signing, App Store/Google Play submission, CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Fastlane), release management, beta testing, crash reporting, and production monitoring.",
      "path": "./agents/07-devops-deployment.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-platform-native",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Platform & Native Integration",
      "description": "Platform integration specialist: Platform channels (Method, Event, Basic Message), iOS Swift/Objective-C interop, Android Kotlin/Java interop, federated plugin architecture, native UI embedding, background processing, and cross-platform feature parity.",
      "path": "./agents/08-flutter-platform-native.md"
    }
  ],
  "commands": [
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-learn",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Learn",
      "description": "Structured learning paths - Beginner (0-6mo), Intermediate (6-12mo), Advanced (12+mo) with clear progression and skill milestones",
      "path": "./commands/learn.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-agents",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Browse Agents",
      "description": "Explore all 8 specialized agents with detailed capabilities, expertise areas, and integration patterns",
      "path": "./commands/browse-agent.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-assess",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Assess",
      "description": "Self-assessment tool - 50+ questions across 8 Flutter development domains to evaluate knowledge level and identify growth areas",
      "path": "./commands/assess.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-projects",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Projects",
      "description": "25+ hands-on project ideas from beginner to advanced - TodoApp, ChatApp, E-commerce, Marketplace, ML integration, and enterprise applications",
      "path": "./commands/projects.md"
    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-ui",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-ui",
      "description": "1700+ lines of Flutter UI mastery - widgets, layouts, Material Design, animations, responsive design with production-ready code examples",
      "path": "./skills/flutter-ui/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-state",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-state",
      "description": "2300+ lines of state management expertise - all patterns with code examples, testing strategies, and architecture patterns",
      "path": "./skills/state-management/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-backend",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-backend",
      "description": "1500+ lines of backend integration - REST, GraphQL, WebSocket, Firebase, authentication, serialization, and error handling",
      "path": "./skills/backend-integration/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-database",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-database",
      "description": "1800+ lines of database architecture - all storage solutions, schema design, encryption, offline-first, sync strategies",
      "path": "./skills/database-storage/SKILL.md"
    },

[**Install Now**](#-quick-start) ¬∑ [**Explore Agents**](#-agents) ¬∑ [**Documentation**](#-skills) ¬∑ [**Star this repo**](https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-terraform) --- ### What is this? > **Terraform Development Assistant** is a Claude Code plugin with **8 agents** and **12 skills** for comprehensive Infrastructure as Code development with Terraform.
--- ## Table of Contents
Click to expand - [Quick Start](#-quick-start) - [Features](#-features) - [Agents](#-agents) - [Skills](#-skills) - [Commands](#-commands) - [Contributing](#-contributing) - [License](#-license)
--- ## Quick Start ### Prerequisites - Claude Code CLI v2.0.27+ - Active Claude subscription ### Installation
Option 1: From Marketplace (Recommended) ```bash # Step 1: Add the marketplace /plugin marketplace add pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-terraform # Step 2: Install the plugin /plugin install custom-plugin-terraform@pluginagentmarketplace-terraform # Step 3: Restart Claude Code # Close and reopen your terminal/IDE ```
Option 2: Local Installation ```bash # Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-terraform.git cd custom-plugin-terraform # Load locally /plugin load . # Restart Claude Code ```
### Verify Installation After restart, you should see these agents: ``` custom-plugin-terraform:tf-fundamentals custom-plugin-terraform:tf-providers custom-plugin-terraform:tf-resources custom-plugin-terraform:tf-state custom-plugin-terraform:tf-modules custom-plugin-terraform:tf-workspaces custom-plugin-terraform:tf-cloud custom-plugin-terraform:tf-advanced ``` --- ## Features - **8 Specialized Agents** covering all Terraform/IaC topics - **12 Golden Format Skills** with assets, scripts, and references - **4 Commands** for common Terraform operations - **SASMP v1.3.0 Compliant** agent-skill architecture - **Multi-Cloud Support** for AWS, Azure, GCP, and more --- ## Agents | Agent | Description | Primary Skill | |-------|-------------|---------------| | `tf-fundamentals` | HCL syntax and basics | tf-basics | | `tf-providers` | Multi-cloud provider configuration | tf-providers | | `tf-resources` | Resource management and lifecycle | tf-resources | | `tf-state` | State backends and locking | tf-state | | `tf-modules` | Reusable module development | tf-modules | | `tf-workspaces` | Environment management | tf-variables | | `tf-cloud` | Terraform Cloud integration | tf-cloud | | `tf-advanced` | Functions and patterns | tf-functions | --- ## Skills ### Core Skills | Skill | Description | |-------|-------------| | `tf-basics` | Terraform fundamentals | | `tf-hcl` | HCL syntax and expressions | ### Configuration Skills | Skill | Description | |-------|-------------| | `tf-providers` | Provider configuration | | `tf-resources` | Resource blocks | | `tf-variables` | Input variables | | `tf-outputs` | Output values | ### State Skills | Skill | Description | |-------|-------------| | `tf-state` | State management | | `tf-modules` | Module development | ### Advanced Skills | Skill | Description | |-------|-------------| | `tf-functions` | Built-in functions | | `tf-provisioners` | Provisioners and connections | | `tf-cloud` | Terraform Cloud | | `tf-best-practices` | Best practices | --- ## Commands | Command | Description | |---------|-------------| | `/tf-check` | Validate Terraform configuration | | `/tf-init` | Initialize Terraform directory | | `/tf-plan` | Preview infrastructure changes | | `/tf-apply` | Apply infrastructure changes | --- ## Contributing See [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) for contribution guidelines. --- ## License Custom License - See [LICENSE](LICENSE) for details. Copyright (c) 2025 Dr. Umit Kacar & Muhsin Elcicek ---

  "name": "ios-development-assistant",

  "author": "Roadmap Team",
  "homepage": "https://roadmap.sh",
  "repository": "https://github.com/kamranahmedse/developer-roadmap",
  "keywords": [
    "learning",
    "roadmap",
    "developer",
    "career-path",
    "ai-ml",
    "frontend",
    "backend",
    "devops",
    "mobile",
    "games",
    "specialized-roles",
    "fundamentals"
  ],
  "agents": [
    "./agents/01-ios-fundamentals.md",
    "./agents/02-uikit-development.md",

    "./agents/07-app-store.md"

Agents ### 7 Specialized ML Agents | # | Agent | Description | Primary Skill | |---|-------|-------------|---------------| | 1 | **01-ml-fundamentals** | ML foundations: algorithms, preprocessing, feature engineering, evaluation | `ml-fundamentals` | | 2 | **02-supervised-learning** | Classification, regression, ensemble methods, hyperparameter tuning | `supervised-learning` | | 3 | **03-unsupervised-learning** | Clustering, dimensionality reduction, anomaly detection | `clustering` | | 4 | **04-deep-learning** | Neural networks, PyTorch/TensorFlow, training strategies | `deep-learning` | | 5 | **05-nlp** | Text processing, transformers, LLMs, embeddings | `nlp-basics` | | 6 | **06-computer-vision** | Image classification, object detection, segmentation | `computer-vision` | | 7 | **07-model-deployment** | APIs, Docker, monitoring, MLOps, A/B testing | `ml-deployment` | ### Agent Features Each agent includes: - **Role & Responsibility Boundaries** - Clear scope definition - **Input/Output Schemas** - Type-safe interfaces - **Error Handling** - Exponential backoff retry logic - **Token Optimization** - Context management - **Troubleshooting Guide** - Common issues & solutions - **Integration Points** - Cross-references to related agents/skills --- ## files..claude-plugin/plugin.json:
{
  "name": "kubernetes-assistant",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "type": "plugin",
  "description": "Production-grade Kubernetes cluster management, orchestration, and container platform expertise. Master container deployments, cluster administration, networking, security, service mesh, GitOps, and enterprise-grade Kubernetes operations.",
  "eqhm_enabled": true,
  "author": {
    "name": "Plugin Agent Marketplace",
    "email": "pluginagentmarketplace@gmail.com",
    "url": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-kubernetes"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-kubernetes",
  "repository": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-kubernetes",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "keywords": [
    "kubernetes",
    "container-orchestration",
    "docker",
    "devops",
    "cluster-management",
    "containerization",
    "cloud-native",
    "production",
    "service-mesh",
    "istio",
    "gitops",
    "argocd",
    "helm",
    "observability",
    "security",
    "multi-cluster"
  ],
  "commands": [
    {
      "name": "quickstart",
      "description": "Get started with Kubernetes - learn basics and best practices"
    },
    {
      "name": "cluster-setup",
      "description": "Guide for setting up production Kubernetes clusters"
    },
    {
      "name": "troubleshoot",
      "description": "Diagnose and resolve Kubernetes issues"
    },
    {
      "name": "best-practices",
      "description": "Learn Kubernetes best practices and patterns"
    }
  ],
  "agents": [
    {
      "name": "Cluster Administration & Architecture",
      "file": "./agents/01-cluster-admin.md",
      "description": "Expert in Kubernetes cluster setup, management, architecture, and operational excellence",
      "capabilities": [
        "cluster-management",
        "etcd",
        "upgrades",
        "disaster-recovery"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Container Runtime & Docker",
      "file": "./agents/02-container-runtime.md",
      "description": "Specialist in Docker, container runtimes, image management, and container technologies",
      "capabilities": [
        "docker",
        "containerd",
        "image-building",
        "registry-management"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Deployment & Orchestration",
      "file": "./agents/03-deployment-orchestration.md",
      "description": "Expert in Kubernetes deployments, StatefulSets, DaemonSets, and workload orchestration",
      "capabilities": [
        "deployments",
        "statefulsets",
        "rollout-strategies",
        "hpa",
        "vpa"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Storage & Networking",
      "file": "./agents/04-storage-networking.md",
      "description": "Specialist in persistent storage, networking, service mesh, and cluster communication",
      "capabilities": [
        "csi",
        "pvc",
        "cni",
        "network-policies",
        "gateway-api"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Security & RBAC",
      "file": "./agents/05-security-rbac.md",
      "description": "Expert in Kubernetes security, RBAC, network policies, and compliance",
      "capabilities": [
        "rbac",
        "pss",
        "opa",
        "kyverno",
        "secrets-management"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Monitoring & Observability",
      "file": "./agents/06-monitoring-observability.md",
      "description": "Specialist in observability, monitoring, logging, metrics, and distributed tracing",
      "capabilities": [
        "prometheus",
        "grafana",
        "loki",
        "opentelemetry",
        "slo-alerting"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Development & GitOps",
      "file": "./agents/07-development-gitops.md",
      "description": "Expert in development workflows, CI/CD integration, Helm, and GitOps practices",
      "capabilities": [
        "argocd",
        "helm",
        "kustomize",
        "github-actions",
        "progressive-delivery"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Service Mesh Expert",
      "file": "./agents/08-service-mesh-expert.md",
      "description": "Specialist in service mesh implementation with Istio, Linkerd, traffic management, and zero-trust networking",
      "capabilities": [
        "istio",
        "linkerd",
        "mtls",
        "traffic-management",
        "circuit-breaking"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    {
      "name": "cluster-admin",
      "file": "./skills/cluster-admin/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "Cluster lifecycle management, HA, etcd backup, upgrades"
    },
    {
      "name": "docker-containers",
      "file": "./skills/docker-containers/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "Container image building, optimization, security scanning"
    },
    {
      "name": "deployments",
      "file": "./skills/deployments/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "03-deployment-orchestration",
      "description": "Deployment strategies, HPA, PDB, Argo Rollouts"
    },
    {
      "name": "storage-networking",
      "file": "./skills/storage-networking/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "04-storage-networking",
      "description": "CSI drivers, Gateway API, NetworkPolicy, CNI"
    },
    {
      "name": "security",
      "file": "./skills/security/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "05-security-rbac",
      "description": "RBAC, PSS, Kyverno, External Secrets Operator"
    },
    {
      "name": "monitoring",
      "file": "./skills/monitoring/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "06-monitoring-observability",
      "description": "Prometheus, Loki, OpenTelemetry, SLO-based alerting"
    },
    {
      "name": "gitops",
      "file": "./skills/gitops/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "07-development-gitops",
      "description": "ArgoCD, Kustomize, GitHub Actions CI/CD"
    },
    {
      "name": "helm",
      "file": "./skills/helm/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "07-development-gitops",
      "description": "Helm chart development, values schema, release management"
    },
    {
      "name": "troubleshooting",
      "file": "./skills/troubleshooting/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "Pod debugging, log analysis, network diagnosis"
    },
    {
      "name": "multi-cluster",
      "file": "./skills/multi-cluster/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "Cluster federation, Cilium Mesh, Velero DR"
    },
    {
      "name": "cost-optimization",
      "file": "./skills/cost-optimization/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "VPA, KEDA, Kubecost, resource right-sizing"
    },
    {
      "name": "service-mesh",
      "file": "./skills/service-mesh/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "08-service-mesh-expert",
      "description": "Istio, Linkerd, mTLS, traffic management"
    }
  ],
  "hooks": [
    {
      "event": "onPluginLoaded",
      "script": "scripts/init-plugin.sh"
    }
  ],
  "minimumClaudeVersion": "3.7.0",
  "capabilities": {
    "multiAgent": true,
    "parallelExecution": true,
    "skillBased": true,
    "agentBonding": true
  }
}

[![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-2.0.0-blue?style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-graphql/releases) [![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Custom-yellow?style=for-the-badge)](LICENSE) [![Status](https://img.shields.io/badge/Status-Production-brightgreen?style=for-the-badge)](#) [![SASMP](https://img.shields.io/badge/SASMP-v1.3.0-blueviolet?style=for-the-badge)](#) [![Agents](https://img.shields.io/badge/Agents-7-orange?style=flat-square&logo=robot)](#-agents) [![Skills](https://img.shields.io/badge/Skills-7-purple?style=flat-square&logo=lightning)](#-skills) [![Commands](https://img.shields.io/badge/Commands-4-green?style=flat-square&logo=terminal)](#-commands)
[**Install Now**](#-quick-start) | [**Explore Agents**](#-agents) | [**View Skills**](#-skills) | [**Star this repo**](https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-graphql) --- ### What is this? > **GraphQL Development Assistant** is a production-grade Claude Code plugin with **7 specialized agents** and **7 skills** for building GraphQL APIs - from fundamentals to production deployment.
--- ## Table of Contents
Click to expand - [Quick Start](#-quick-start) - [Features](#-features) - [Agents](#-agents) - [Skills](#-skills) - [Commands](#-commands) - [Architecture](#-architecture) - [Documentation](#-documentation) - [Contributing](#-contributing) - [License](#-license)
--- ## Quick Start ### Prerequisites - Claude Code CLI v2.0.27+ - Active Claude subscription ### Installation (Choose One)
Option 1: From Marketplace (Recommended) ```bash # Step 1: Add the plugin /plugin marketplace add pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-graphql # Step 2: Restart Claude Code # Close and reopen your terminal/IDE ```
Option 2: Local Installation ```bash # Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-graphql.git cd custom-plugin-graphql # Load locally /plugin load . # Restart Claude Code ```
### Verify Installation After restart, you should see 7 GraphQL agents available. --- ## Features | Feature | Description | |---------|-------------| | **7 Specialized Agents** | GraphQL Fundamentals, Schema Design, Resolvers, Apollo Server, Apollo Client, Security, Codegen | | **7 Production Skills** | Complete code examples, patterns, and troubleshooting guides | | **4 Interactive Commands** | Learn, Assess, Browse Agents, View Roadmaps | | **SASMP v1.3.0** | Full protocol compliance with agent-skill bonding | | **Production Patterns** | DataLoader, Federation, graphql-shield, TypeScript codegen | --- ## Agents ### 7 Specialized GraphQL Agents | # | Agent | Purpose | Expertise | |---|-------|---------|-----------| | 1 | **01-graphql-fundamentals** | Core GraphQL educator | Types, queries, mutations, subscriptions, fragments | | 2 | **02-graphql-schema** | Schema design architect | Naming conventions, pagination, error handling, interfaces | | 3 | **03-graphql-resolvers** | Performance specialist | DataLoader, N+1 prevention, batching, context design | | 4 | **04-graphql-apollo-server** | Server configuration expert | Apollo Server v4, plugins, federation, caching | | 5 | **05-graphql-apollo-client** | React integration expert | Hooks, cache management, optimistic UI, subscriptions | | 6 | **06-graphql-security** | Security architect | JWT auth, graphql-shield, rate limiting, validation | | 7 | **07-graphql-codegen** | TypeScript code generation | Types, React hooks, configuration, fragments | ### Invoke Agents ``` Task(subagent_type="graphql:01-graphql-fundamentals") Task(subagent_type="graphql:02-graphql-schema") Task(subagent_type="graphql:03-graphql-resolvers") Task(subagent_type="graphql:04-graphql-apollo-server") Task(subagent_type="graphql:05-graphql-apollo-client") Task(subagent_type="graphql:06-graphql-security") Task(subagent_type="graphql:07-graphql-codegen") ``` --- ## Skills ### 7 Production-Grade Skills | Skill | Description | Complexity | Invoke | |-------|-------------|------------|--------| | **graphql-fundamentals** | Types, queries, mutations, subscriptions | Beginner | `Skill("graphql-fundamentals")` | | **graphql-schema-design** | Naming, pagination, error patterns | Intermediate | `Skill("graphql-schema-design")` | | **graphql-resolvers** | DataLoader, batching, N+1 prevention | Intermediate | `Skill("graphql-resolvers")` | | **graphql-apollo-server** | Server v4, plugins, federation | Advanced | `Skill("graphql-apollo-server")` | | **graphql-apollo-client** | React hooks, cache, optimistic UI | Intermediate | `Skill("graphql-apollo-client")` | | **graphql-security** | Auth, rate limiting, validation | Advanced | `Skill("graphql-security")` | | **graphql-codegen** | TypeScript types, React hooks | Intermediate | `Skill("graphql-codegen")` | ### Skill Features Each skill includes: - Quick reference tables - Production code examples - Troubleshooting guides - Debug checklists - Related skills and agents --- ## Commands | Command | Description | Usage | |---------|-------------|-------| | `/learn` | Interactive GraphQL learning path | `/learn [topic]` | | `/assess` | Knowledge assessment & skill gap analysis | `/assess [topic]` | | `/browse-agent` | Explore 7 specialized GraphQL agents | `/browse-agent [name]` | | `/roadmap` | Complete GraphQL learning roadmaps | `/roadmap [path]` | ### Example Usage ```bash # Start learning GraphQL /learn fundamentals # Assess your knowledge /assess # Browse available agents /browse-agent # View full-stack roadmap /roadmap full-stack ``` --- ## Architecture ### Agent-Skill Bonding ``` Agent Skill (PRIMARY_BOND) ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ 01-graphql-fundamentals ‚Üê‚Üí graphql-fundamentals 02-graphql-schema ‚Üê‚Üí graphql-schema-design 03-graphql-resolvers ‚Üê‚Üí graphql-resolvers 04-graphql-apollo-server ‚Üê‚Üí graphql-apollo-server 05-graphql-apollo-client ‚Üê‚Üí graphql-apollo-client 06-graphql-security ‚Üê‚Üí graphql-security 07-graphql-codegen ‚Üê‚Üí graphql-codegen ``` ### Learning Path Dependencies ``` fundamentals (no prerequisites) ‚Üì schema-design (requires: fundamentals) ‚Üì resolvers (requires: fundamentals, schema) ‚Üì ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¥‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê ‚Üì ‚Üì server client (requires: fundamentals) ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚Üì ‚Üì security codegen ``` --- ## Project Structure
Click to expand ``` custom-plugin-graphql/ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ .claude-plugin/ ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ plugin.json # Plugin manifest ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ marketplace.json # Marketplace metadata ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ agents/ # 7 specialized agents ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 01-graphql-fundamentals.md ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 02-graphql-schema.md ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 03-graphql-resolvers.md ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 04-graphql-apollo-server.md ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 05-graphql-apollo-client.md ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 06-graphql-security.md ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ 07-graphql-codegen.md ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ skills/ # 7 production skills ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ graphql-fundamentals/SKILL.md ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ graphql-schema-design/SKILL.md ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ graphql-resolvers/SKILL.md ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ graphql-apollo-server/SKILL.md ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ graphql-apollo-client/SKILL.md ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ graphql-security/SKILL.md ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ graphql-codegen/SKILL.md ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ commands/ # 4 interactive commands ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ learn.md ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ assess.md ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ browse-agent.md ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ roadmap.md ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ hooks/ ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ hooks.json ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ README.md ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ CHANGELOG.md ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ LICENSE ```

**Production-Grade** with error handling and observability --- ## Agents | Agent | Description | Primary Skill | |-------|-------------|---------------| | `pg-fundamentals` | Master PostgreSQL basics | pg-basics | | `pg-sql-mastery` | SQL excellence and query writing | pg-queries | | `pg-data-types` | Type system mastery | pg-ddl | | `pg-indexing` | Index strategies and optimization | pg-indexes | | `pg-performance` | Performance tuning and analysis | pg-performance | | `pg-administration` | DBA operations and maintenance | pg-backup | | `pg-replication` | High availability setup | pg-replication | | `pg-advanced` | PL/pgSQL and extensions | pg-functions | --- ## Skills ### Core Skills | Skill | Description | |-------|-------------| | `pg-basics` | PostgreSQL fundamentals and setup | | `pg-ddl` | Data Definition Language | | `pg-dml` | Data Manipulation Language | | `pg-queries` | Advanced query techniques | ### Performance Skills | Skill | Description | |-------|-------------| | `pg-indexes` | Index types and strategies | | `pg-performance` | Query optimization | | `pg-transactions` | Transaction management | ### Administration Skills | Skill | Description | |-------|-------------| | `pg-backup` | Backup and recovery | | `pg-replication` | Replication setup | | `pg-security` | Security hardening | ### Advanced Skills | Skill | Description | |-------|-------------| | `pg-functions` | PL/pgSQL programming | | `pg-extensions` | Extension management | --- ## Commands | Command | Description | |---------|-------------| | `/pg-check` | Database health checks | | `/pg-query` | Execute query with EXPLAIN ANALYZE | | `/pg-optimize` | Performance optimization suggestions | | `/pg-backup` | Create database backups | --- ## Contributing See [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) for contribution guidelines. --- ## License Custom License - {
  "schema_version": "1.0",
  "name": "custom-plugin-aspnet-core",
  "title": "Custom Plugin ASP.NET Core",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "description": "Production-grade ASP.NET Core development plugin with 3 agents, 3 skills, and complete learning infrastructure for enterprise applications. Implements 2024-2025 best practices including Clean Architecture, CQRS, GitOps, and comprehensive observability.",
  "author": "Custom Plugin Team",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "keywords": [
    "aspnet-core",
    "csharp",
    "dotnet",
    "web-development",
    "enterprise",
    "microservices",
    "api-development",
    "clean-architecture",
    "cqrs",
    "docker",
    "kubernetes",
    "azure",
    "devops"
  ],
  "agents": [
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-backend",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core Backend Specialist",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "description": "Expert in ASP.NET Core backend development, APIs, and enterprise applications with production-grade patterns",
      "path": "./agents/aspnet-core-backend.md",
      "capabilities": [
        "ASP.NET Core Framework",
        "C# Programming",
        "RESTful API Design",
        "Entity Framework Core",
        "Authentication & Authorization",
        "Performance Optimization"
      ],
      "io_schema": {
        "input": [
          "query",
          "context"
        ],
        "output": [
          "response",
          "code_blocks",
          "references"
        ]
      }
    },
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-devops",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core DevOps & Infrastructure",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "description": "Expert in ASP.NET Core deployment, Docker, Azure, CI/CD, and Kubernetes with GitOps practices",
      "path": "./agents/aspnet-core-devops.md",
      "capabilities": [
        "Docker & Containerization",
        "Azure Cloud Services",
        "CI/CD Pipelines",
        "Kubernetes Orchestration",
        "Infrastructure as Code",
        "Monitoring & Observability"
      ],
      "io_schema": {
        "input": [
          "query",
          "context"
        ],
        "output": [
          "response",
          "manifests",
          "commands",
          "warnings"
        ]
      }
    },
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-architecture",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core Architecture & Design",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "description": "Expert in system design, patterns, and enterprise architecture with DDD and CQRS",
      "path": "./agents/aspnet-core-architecture.md",
      "capabilities": [
        "Architectural Patterns",
        "SOLID Principles",
        "Design Patterns",
        "Domain-Driven Design",
        "CQRS & Event Sourcing",
        "Microservices Architecture"
      ],
      "io_schema": {
        "input": [
          "query",
          "context"
        ],
        "output": [
          "response",
          "diagrams",
          "trade_offs",
          "recommendations"
        ]
      }
    }
  ],
  "commands": [
    {
      "name": "learn",
      "description": "Start learning ASP.NET Core with personalized path",
      "path": "./commands/learn.md",
      "usage": "/learn [track]",
      "exit_codes": {
        "0": "Success",
        "1": "Invalid track specified"
      }
    },
    {
      "name": "project",
      "description": "Get hands-on project templates and guidance",
      "path": "./commands/project.md",
      "usage": "/project [level]",
      "exit_codes": {
        "0": "Success",
        "1": "Invalid level specified"
      }
    },
    {
      "name": "deploy",
      "description": "Deploy ASP.NET Core application to production",
      "path": "./commands/deploy.md",
      "usage": "/deploy [target]",
      "exit_codes": {
        "0": "Success",
        "1": "Deployment failed",
        "2": "Configuration error"
      }
    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-fundamentals",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core Fundamentals",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "path": "./skills/aspnet-core-fundamentals/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "aspnet-core-backend",
      "features": {
        "parameter_validation": true,
        "retry_logic": true,
        "observability": true,
        "test_templates": true
      }
    },
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-advanced",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core Advanced Development",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "path": "./skills/aspnet-core-advanced/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "aspnet-core-architecture",
      "features": {
        "parameter_validation": true,
        "retry_logic": true,
        "observability": true,
        "test_templates": true
      }
    },
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-devops",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core DevOps & Production",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "path": "./skills/aspnet-core-devops/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "aspnet-core-devops",
      "features": {
        "parameter_validation": true,
        "retry_logic": true,
        "observability": true,
        "test_templates": true
      }
    }
  ],
  "requirements": {
    "claude_code_version": ">=1.0.0",
    "sasmp_version": "1.3.0"
  },
  "quality_standards": {
    "ethical": "No dark patterns, transparent behavior",
    "honest": "Accurate capability claims",
    "modern": "2024-2025 industry standards",
    "maintainable": "Self-documenting code"
  },
  "changelog": {
    "2.0.0": {
      "date": "2025-12-30",
      "changes": [
        "Added I/O schemas to all agents",
        "Implemented error handling with retry policies",
        "Added comprehensive troubleshooting guides",
        "Implemented parameter validation for all skills",
        "Added observability hooks (logging, metrics, tracing)",
        "Included unit test templates",
        "Updated to ASP.NET Core 8/9 best practices",
        "Added integrity checks"
      ]
    },
    "1.0.0": {
      "date": "2025-01-01",
      "changes": [
        "Initial release with SASMP v1.3.0 compliance"
      ]
    }
  }
}
